name: Time Out (AleisFine)
description:
Feedback would be insanely appreciated - this is the fist thing I’ve ever “published” 

The plot for the game is that you have been put in time out and told not to get up from the stool, the solution is to take the stool with you. Not sure if its a game that anyone would be interested in playing so i would love to get some feedback before continuing work, future improvements include better graphics and animations, a much bigger school with a much more complex storyline, and whatever else people want, but for now here is just a proof of concept
